author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Watch R Madhavan And Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Vikram Vedha's Official Teaser
text: tweet Here’s the official teaser of the upcoming Tamil crime thriller Vikram Vedha featuring R Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi. While Madhavan has donned the character of an encounter specialist, Vijay Sethupathi essays the role of a gangster. Watch this gripping teaser right here: Watch R Madhavan And Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Vikram Vedha’s Official Teaser Written and directed by Pushkar and Gayatri, the film also features Varalakshmi, Shraddha Srinath and Kathir in pivotal roles.
